questions_and_notes: Vertical coordinate should be alevel.  pr18O, prsn18O, sw18O, prw18O should probably all be evaluated consistently (all "where sea" or all for the entire grid cell). Also they should be consistent with the 17O variables.
specific_issues: 8:Deprecate? Only 0 groups contributed this variable in CMIP6.
cell_methods: area: mean where sea time: mean
long_name: Mass of Water Vapor Containing Oxygen-18 (H2 18O) in Layer
comment: Water vapor path for water molecules that contain oxygen-18 (H2 18O)
